house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1956 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 bath(s) . Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace, skylights, storage space.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Fire Pit, Gas logs, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, EatIn Kitchen, Game Room, Great Room, Library, Loft, Pantry, Ranch Style,Skylights, Storage Space
